website_summaries.verdict: The Lumo Lift offers a fresh alternative to other fitness trackers, but its limited features will disappoint anyone who wants to track multiple metrics.
pros: The Lumo Lift goes beyond typical fitness metrics to measure your posture
It's also comfortable to wear and can even pass as an accessory
cons: The Lift app's offers too much design and not enough data

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - App no longer supported, product doesn’t work w/o the app.
customer_reviews.text: The company that makes the Lumo Lift was sold. The new company stopped supporting the Lumo Lift app which the physical product needs to function. Now my Lumo Lift is nothing more than an expensive paperweight and a reminder of why we should be weary of physical products that require apps to function.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Lumo Bodytech, Inc. has ceased operations
customer_reviews.text: Update Apr 2019: Interestingly, someone is still updating/maintaining the IOS app. It worked well for me for over a year. Had to replace when I washed it. However the company has ceased operations as of Jun 29, 2018, so bear this in mind if you are looking to buy this. Too bad! Check their website to see the announcement. Hopefully, someone will resuscitate it.
customer_reviews.author: RedPill

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY: App not available since 2018. Product doesn't really work without app.
customer_reviews.text: This product no longer works. It is ethically questionable, and possibly fraudulent, to keep selling this product because it no longer works. It cannot work as it is advertised on Amazon without the app. And the app is no longer available. This product is worthless. The 3rd party seller says in bold font that Lumo Lift requires the free Lumo Lift app for IOS/Android. they also say further down that before purchase a person should check the app or play store before purchase. They have been told via user feedback that the app is no longer available, but they keep selling it as though it is.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Reed

customer_reviews.title: Lumo LIft's company, LumBodyTech, has gone out of business.
customer_reviews.text: Website says the product is no longer supported! New company has no mention of support. Sad day!
customer_reviews.author: Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work at all! Sometimes it buzzes all the time even when you have the right posture. I tried returning the item but it was past the returning date. I gave it another chance but there is no way around it...it doesn't work. I regret getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop nuisance alerts
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews saying that you have to be careful how you wear it, and that you have to wear it on snug fitting clothes. I wear close fitting tshirts on the weekends and form fitting undershirts under my work clothes. Sounded easy enough. However, I tried for several days to get this thing calibrated so it would give me reasonable alerts and it never worked very well. What's more, although it's small, it's quite visible and everybody asked me what it was. After almost non-stop nuisance alerts for several days I'm giving up and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I returned this the first day I bought it... it took forever to connect via Bluetooth and the app sucks... the concept of the device is good but you have to wear a tight shirt in order to have it detect... in the beginning you register your posture but my issue is how do I know if my first posture is correct so it makes it hard to tell what's accurate. Overall, this didn't work for me and I will try doing exercises instead. Thanks but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyRed

customer_reviews.title: Original company does not exist
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product. The original company was bought by another firm and the app no longer supports the device.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth S.

customer_reviews.title: Android App not working anymore... no service.. no support
customer_reviews.text: If you run Android, DO NOT BUY !!! App doesn't work on Android. No service, no support, no email.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Works when it works, now mostly useless
customer_reviews.text: My son used it for his slouching and it worked, for about a month. Now we cant get into the App and there is no customer suppport so it is useless. Felt like i have thrown away the money. Do NOT buy it.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Not the solution you were hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited when I ordered it and have been disappointed ever since. It does not correctly determine if you are indeed slouching or having bad posture and just vibrates all the time. It's way too heavy to attach to most tops for females and magnet often falls apart. Bummed that I didn't get a chance to return it within the window. Don't make the same mistake. Now I have a $80 reminder to not buy into a new and cool "solution".
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Will need to dress differently to use it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the Lumo Lift long enough to review it fully, but in my brief time with it, I would underline what the company says about needing to wear tight-fitting clothing. My undershirts are not loose or baggy, but they also are not skin-tight either, and my Lift hardly ever vibrates to remind me to sit up straight. If your clothes do not hug your skin when you lean forward, the Lift won't work. I think a lot of men will find, like me, that they need to dress differently if they want to use the Lift.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It actually works. It has become part of my ...
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. It has become part of my wardrobe so when I get dressed, Lumo is there as part of my t-shirt selection. Practically speaking it has improved my image as well as my posture. I'm 83 and was tending to stoop but that has stopped, for the most part, thanks to Lumo. Not as tough as boot camp back in the day, but just as effective and a whole lot gentler.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 3 days. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for 3 days. After that, it simply stopped working. It did not vibrate no matter how much I slouched. I reset it often as instructed but it still did not work. I have sclerosis and back pain and I hoped it would help me correct these. Saw great reviews before purchase, and even bought an extra package of differently colored clasps because I thought I would use it for a long time. After it stopped working, I found negative reviews by people who had a very similar experience and decided that it is not worth getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Niania

customer_reviews.title: Never had a chance
customer_reviews.text: I might have given this a higher rating if I could use it. I ware scrubs and the clasp for a bra was not in the package. I've tried MANY times to contact Lumo Lift customer service { Is there really one} but have been on hold for so long I just hung up!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ciancaglione

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the device two years ago. At one point the device was no longer supported as the company sold in the app didn’t work. When I found out the company restarted the app, now my Lumos lift device has a battery issue and doesn’t even work. For as much money as I paid for this and the fact that I’ve barely used it and it doesn’t work two years later it’s pretty disturbing
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Battiste

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory and in software - in practice the hardware doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I got this device in December and now in August it won't even hold a charge with normal use. Attempted to see if I could use their 365 day (standard) warranty however their site does not allow and requires I return it from original point of purchase. I'm unable to do so since it's out of MFG warranty. Waste of money when it doesn't last even a year and the first one I received didn't power on. Shame it's the only item on the market for posture and they're not standing behind a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it actually worked...
customer_reviews.text: I thought Lumo Lift was amazing, up until it stopped vibrating. I submitted a Service Request and never heard back from anybody. The product worked for around 2 months. If it was still working I would be extremely happy however to pay $80 for something that only worked 2 months and then to never hear back from anybody on my issues, not a good deal. Sorry, I really wish it was still working.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnikray

customer_reviews.title: Best product of its kind
customer_reviews.text: I used to set hourly reminders on my phone to remind me to straighten my posture, so finding out this product existed was a very welcome surprise. The ability to set, turn on, and turn off the device by just pressing it without pulling out your phone is very convenient. I hunch forward with my neck a lot; unfortunately the lumo lift doesn't pick up my neck positioning as much as the shoulders and chest. Still the best product for this purpose I've heard of.
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Magnet Holder not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but major problem was the magnet that is supposed to hold the device in place. It is not strong enough. It kept falling off and the 2nd day it fell off & was lost. They give you two so there was a backup. The 2nd issue is how you set your posture. I guess I set mine over optimistically too straight and it went off about 80 times the first day. This is a product that is not practical for me. Now when I feel my self slouching I think of the lumo lift banished forever in my junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Lcava2

customer_reviews.title: This really works and is truly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Lumo Lift has made a difference in my posture in less than one week. The unobtrusive device and vibration are excellent reminders to keep me standing and sitting with good posture. Best results are if worn with a more tight fitting at the top shirt or dress which is not always practical for women however placing it on a bra takes care of this issue. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: You have no idea how much you have improved my quality of life.
customer_reviews.text: If you have bad posture or work at a computer more than 4 hours a day. Get this. It will change your life. This works for back and Neck!!!!! I did not have to do any work arounds. I place it where I should. It still detects neck or back bad posture and I get vibrated and straiten up. I have not had any false alarms. Make sure you ease into it, as you will be using different muscles like your core for the first time in years. Thank you for this product. You have no idea how much you have improved my quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: T.R. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: LumoLift Improve My Posture
customer_reviews.text: I first bought Lumo Lift when it was in Kickstarter for my boyfriend. I was AMAZED by how quickly his posture improved. When I saw this new design, I was really excited to buy it (the belt thing looks really irritating lol) This clip is SO easy to use. Nobody notices at all and it definitely notifies me when I'm slouching. I never realized how much I slouched before until Lumo Lift. At first, my shoulders, back, and abs would hurt A LOT - as if I had just done a really rigorous exercise. But after a while, I got used to the new posture and now it HURTS to slouch!!! It's incredible. This has changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on it
customer_reviews.text: The way it measures your ideal posture doesn't seem to be very scientific. Also, the buzzing is quite loud and noticeable in an office environment - and due to some glitch within the app, you have to turn the vibrations off several times a day for it to stop freakin' buzzing. If it works to improve your posture and well-being, perfect. However, I wasn't able to get through more than one full day without wanting to fling it against the wall
customer_reviews.author: J. Morson

customer_reviews.title: App sucks and doesnt record data as Bluetooth doesn't sync well
customer_reviews.text: This product is just not worth $80. I had really high hopes but it is 1. Intermittent no matter what you wear or how you place it. Not really consistent at reminding you which is it's sole purpose. 2. App sucks and doesnt record data as Bluetooth doesn't sync well. 3. Another thing to charge and small so easily lost. 4. Doesn't blend in with clothing so tons of questions on this daily or stares... Just don't buy it as important as posture is this doesn't help much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device has been particularly effective for me to address my poor posture. It is simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Changing one's habits necessitates some sort of on-going feedback or metrics. This device has been particularly effective for me to address my poor posture. It is simple and effective. I also want to give kudos as to my experience of its ruggedness. I lost it for about a month before discovering it in the washing machine. It had gone through somewhere between 30-40 wash cycles. However, it recharged and works fine now. This is rather amazing and is far beyond the ruggedness claimed.
customer_reviews.author: R.O., MD

customer_reviews.title: So, far I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a week, but so far I really like it. I find that it's important to follow their advice about re-setting the device several times throughout the day, especially if you change activity. For example, you might need to adjust the setting for when you are sitting at your desk, standing, or sitting in the car. The summary provided broken down by hours is useful. And you can compare your progress across days.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hallahan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! I have had it for several months now ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Terrible Terrible ! I have had it for several months now and only have used it a handful of times. It just won't charge anymore. I have tried numerous times and it just won't charge. I even emailed the support center, and they recommended I just wipe down the device and double check the USB charging... Then they proceeded to recommend that I buy a new charger. I just don't think they made a good enough product, it's not user error. Complete piece of crap - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Had the Lumo Lift for a couple of years and it was fine. However, with the last software update, it stopped working. The sensor update keeps showing ‘something went wrong’ and never changes from the 0% update screen. Too bad - turned the device into e-trash.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Interesting idea but needs work...
customer_reviews.text: Found the accuracy to be off. Having to adjust numerous time between sitting and standing up. Need to wear tight clothing with the sensor or else you won't feel it and it throws off the accuracy. Does not come with bra clip like advertised and listed on the box. It would work much better with the clip however the Lumo website wants to charge an additional $5 for one. All in all, not worth the $80; a better price point would probably be around $40 with the clip included.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: It works well if you have the right clothes
customer_reviews.text: It works well if you have the right clothes. I could not get it to work on my bra strap and my summer clothes are too loose/hanging to attach it to. However, in the colder weather, it works well attached to my form fitting long sleeve shirts that I wear under sweaters and blazers. Kind of limiting, that it only works for me In the colder months, but then it has been very helpful to remind me to maintain my posture throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shafter

customer_reviews.title: Sitting and standing taller!
customer_reviews.text: The Lumo is easy to use and immediately helped me be conscious of how I am sitting and standing. I have been wearing it for a week and it has already made a huge difference. It hardly even buzzes now because I am sitting up straight on my own. How we carry ourselves is so important to how we are seen by the world. Get the Lumo. Work on your posture. Show the world you are confident! I plan on selling or loaning mine out after a couple of months so that someone else will be able to gain the benefits of an improved posture, too.
customer_reviews.author: H. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on most of my shirts
customer_reviews.text: While this does vibrate and reminded me to stand up straight, it did not work with the majority of my shirts. Shirt material needs to be very tight and without any stretch, such a cotton shirt. Any shirt with stretch will get stretched out and then the Lumo won’t sit correctly against your body. I’m really bummed because it did work, but is just not practical for mine or most women’s wardrobes.
customer_reviews.author: KACP

customer_reviews.title: Lumo lift is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Lumo lift for a few weeks now and it has really helped me improve my posture. I never Door knob how much I slumped during the day until I started using the Lumo lift. I would recommend it to any wanting to really improve their posture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the feedback it offers & feel it is helping me with my posture.
customer_reviews.text: The official version of the android app doesn't support the Note 5. I wrote to them & they wrote back with a place where I could download it directly from them. This seems to work. It's also great to have them be responsive to my question. I like having the thing buzz when I slouch. I've been working at good posture & I think this device is helping me with this. It also works as a pedometer, which makes the 3rd one I have available (of which I use the garmin), but it's nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I like my lumo lift as it works but the cost to replace the magnet is $25!! $25! They don't have product support after owning it for 6 months. I almost lost my Lumo lift when I saved someone from crossing the street because they were looking at there phone. Luckily I found the lumo but not the magnet. Needless to say im disappointed I cant get in contact with the seller and explain my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my lumo lift! I see fitbits everywhere, and that's my gripe - they're so obvious. Even with colorful wrist bands, they just aren't attractive. The Lumo lift is private. I wear mine on my bra strap everyday, and love it. The pedometer was my main interest, but the posture coach is fabulous. I'm walking and sitting taller now, and for less $ than the fitbit. Winning!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Warning--Is your product new, as described?
customer_reviews.text: Warning---I purchased this device through Amazon.com LLC. The item was sold to me as new (I rechecked my order), but upon registering my device Lumo Lift informed me the device was previously registered to another. This bad rating is for Amazon.com LLC for selling me a used product as new. It came fully charged (I assume by the previous owner), and have worn it only an hour. I have great hopes for the potential of this product--too bad and sorry the rating is tainted by an incorrect description of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little device is the best. It's so nice to catch myself starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: This little device is the best. It's so nice to catch myself starting to slump at the computer!!! and so easy to use and syncs beautifully with my iPhone. Initially I had a hard time keeping it attached, but now that I use 2 magnets, it works perfectly. Also, now that I've been using it for several weeks, I find that the coach activates less frequently - it feels like both my posture and my core muscles are improving.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H. Kachuck, MD DABMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A perfect subtle reminder to sit or stand up straight. Just what I need. Due to a 6 month hospital stay (4 months in bed and two months learning to walk again) my posture was horrible. I started to work out slowly a year after that. With the addition of the Lumo Lift I am reminded to sit or stand up straight. I was thrilled to have come across this device. I wear it everyday even at the gym. It has made a real difference I my posture. Thanks very much Lumo Lift . It is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in February as I have really poor posture from sitting at a computer all day looking at two monitors (so much for my mom always telling me to sit up straight). I wear it everyday and I have to admit it helps. Looking at spreadsheets all day makes me tend to lean forward, hunching my back, elevating my shoulders and stretching my neck forward. This item is a dream. Whenever I start to get out of alignment, it just lets me know and I correct myself. My shoulders don't hurt as much as they used to and I'm standing and sitting straighter. Thanks Lumo Lift
customer_reviews.author: CRemigio

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Product
customer_reviews.text: A little bit to figure it out but they offer good e-mail support and videos. It does remind me to stand up. Don't wear by your collar bone on the side you fasten your seatbelt because it will get knocked off. I'm senior citizen and my husband wanted me to get it because he doesn't want my shoulders to become hunched.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for something like this to improve body posture
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something like this to improve body posture. Digital items are helping to create slouching. I was skeptical but decided to order the Lumo Lift. I'm very glad I did because it works very well for me. It's very simple to use & understand how to use. I personally think anyone who wishes to improve their body posture should give it a try. It can be returned if one doesn't like it & if you have a problem they work with you to fix it. Check out the site at [...]
customer_reviews.author: mamasueMI

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, has some potential. However the biggest annoyance of it, is not being about to turn it off. I only wear it during the day at work since that is where my issues are, and when i put it in my bag is vibrates the entire way home. I understand the notifications can be turned off, however a "sleep" or off function would greatly improve this and it would conserve battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box came opened, and there were no instructions, ...
customer_reviews.text: Box came opened, and there were no instructions, so I couldn't tell if I'd gotten a new unit or a refurb. Took a few tries to figure out how I was supposed to use it because there were several pieces and it wasn't necessarily intuitive on what each piece was supposed to do. Figured it out using common sense and the internet. It works as advertised. Only giving four stars though because I have no confidence that I actually got what I paid for, by which I mean a brand new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: This makes the device completely useless. FIX IT PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: The app on iOS is broken. You need the app to use the device. The app does not remember the username / login, nor does it remember the progress done. So every time I want to use my lumo lift, I need to re-login, then go through the on-boarding and tutorial. EVERY SINGLE TIME. This makes the device completely useless. FIX IT PLEASE.
customer_reviews.author: Nitzan Wilnai

customer_reviews.title: Improved posture
customer_reviews.text: I'll echo what other users have said, my posture is improving, and as much as i wasn't interested in a pedometer, I have found it to be somewhat engaging trying to get my step count higher than before. I do sometimes get false positives on my posture, when the sensor moves up/down my bra strap -- frequent realignment would fix this, but i get busy and forget. I would like it to have the littlest bit of grip on the inside of the bra clasp.
customer_reviews.author: happy mommy

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy how it reminds me to sit properly
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy how it reminds me to sit properly. I work at a desk all day and found myself slouching a lot. I kept trying to think about it, but I never was able to stay that way, leaving my neck and shoulders all tense. With this, I now am able to sit properly and I have found that my shoulder blades aren't as sore any more. I've also noticed that I feel more confident as I'm walking around because I always have that little reminder. Also helps to have a pedometer too. I wish it did more though...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: Good but has not become a habit
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times but found I would get different reminders. Still great to help you focus on your posture. I wish I could get my teens to use it. The have great information in the emails to encourage you to use it. There is nothing wrong with the unit but I went with 3 stars only because it was not compelling enough for me to use it long enough to make a change in any habit.
customer_reviews.author: DanH

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was in drill team when I was in high school and was accustomed to good posture. Over the years, I became sloppy with my posture. The Lumo Lift has helped me to become more aware of my posture again and I have seen a marked improvement in it since starting with it in late December. I had some problem with the bra clip, however, when I contacted customer support, they provided assistance and worked with me until the problem was resolved. Customer support did not respond to my problem immediately, but they did send an email to tell me when to expect to hear from a representative and I heard from that person in the time frame given.
customer_reviews.author: Reese Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I looked at the Lumo Lift because I wanted to improve my posture and was happy it would also help me to count steps
customer_reviews.text: I had a FitBit and lost it. So I got another, and lost that. I looked at the Lumo Lift because I wanted to improve my posture and was happy it would also help me to count steps. I sometimes slouch and sometimes I don't pay attention to the buzz (in my own world in front of the computer), but then I do and remember to put my shoulders back! It has helped me to pay better attention. And one final good thing... I forgot it on my shirt and put it through the wash! When I couldn't find it and realized what I had done, I pulled it out and it still works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: llinmarin

customer_reviews.title: My wife was pleased with the product and instructed me to send it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for the first few weeks and later the the product failed to charge and became impossible to use, My wife was pleased with the product and instructed me to send it back. I was not happy about it since it work well for such a brief period, I'd thought I leave a comment that the item should be discontinued due to the it not functioning the way it was intended. Amazon should review this product as it does what it was intended but fails to hold a charge and won't charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bazan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service, replaced my fitbit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device, especially if you sit at a desk all day. My back pain is gone thanks to the constant reminders. The device also is pretty accurate at measuring your steps through the day, and has replaced my use of a fitbit. Great value for the price since it tracks posture as well as activity. My first device stopped working after a week and the company quicky sent a free replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga_Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works to build better posture!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product and is helping me develop and maintain good posture. It is small and easy to use. I use the Coach vibrations while I'm at work so I don't slouch in front of the computer. The feedback from Lumo make me feel pretty good about my progress and offers tips on ways to continue improving. It's a bonus that it tracks my steps each day and I've been taking more brief walks for improving both my posture and daily exercise. I feel good about my progress and find wearing the Lumo is helping me meet my goal of having better posture.
customer_reviews.author: L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but this product was not practical for ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. The sensor was awkward to place, became displaced frequently, and manual adjustments need to be made constantly if you move from sitting to standing positions. Great idea, but this product was not practical for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Lumo Lift works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Having used the Lumo Lift daily for a month, I have found the device to perform as advertised. The key to its application is the acceptance of its gentle reminder (vibration) when one deviates from the set “best stance”. It does not cure poor posture, but helps one help oneself by by its reminder. The battery life appears to be as expected. I would encourage anyone who is serious about maximizing “correct posture” to seriously consider the device.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: My chiropractor was amazed. Promptly lost the two original magnets so replaced ...
customer_reviews.text: It has really made a difference in my posture and therefore in fewer back and neck problems. My chiropractor was amazed. Promptly lost the two original magnets so replaced them with a stronger one.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette C. Trum

customer_reviews.title: Slouch No More!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Excellent reminder to the "slouchers" among us! Well made and actually quit attractive hi-tech product. Comfortable to set up and in use. User needs to be sensitive to the need to change parameters for alarm (actually a buzz and vibration) when user changes position, such as standing up to walk instead of sitting at a desk. Very easy to do so; no need to reach below clothing to do so.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Chin up, shoulders back, works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: For years have had trouble with my posture. Well endowed chest and bad habits created serious back pain and lots of chiro appointments. In ONE DAY I was able to get the biofeedback I needed to sit up straight whenever I slouched and on day 1 hit 8 hrs of perfect posture. Totally recommend - best health tracker for my aching back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: For people with absolutely horrible posture maybe this thing works
customer_reviews.text: For people with absolutely horrible posture maybe this thing works. product_meta.title: Lumo Lift: The First Wearable Posture Coach. You slouch, it vibrates! A posture corrector that’s perfect for sitting or working at computers. Comfortable & easy to use. Improve your posture today!
product_meta.description:
Posture is an important but often forgotten part of our daily lives. With plenty going on in our hectic and busy schedules, it can be a real challenge to practice the mindfulness needed to identify and correct poor posture. 

With Lumo Lift, get gentle vibrational reminders for your posture whenever you slouch. Track your posture hours, steps taken, distance travelled and calories burned through the companion iOS, Android or Windows Desktop Lumo Lift app. Lumo Lift requires the free Lumo Lift iOS/Android* app to activate and requires downloading the Lumo Lift manual from www.lumolift.com/manual prior to operating the device. 

Currently compatible with - (view full list here www.lumobodytech.com/compatibility) 
Apple devices running iOS 11.3 or above. Kindly check your iOS App Store to see if you can download the Lumo Lift app to your device prior to purchase. 

Android devices running Android 5.0 or above. Kindly check your phone's Google Play Store for "Lumo Lift" to see if you can download the Lumo Lift app to your phone prior to purchase) 

For any questions, concerns and initial guidance on how to use Lumo Lift most effectively, please first visit our comprehensive Support Center at www.lumobodytech.com/support; call our dedicated call center at 1-877-702-7866; or write us at amazon@lumobodytech.com prior to contacting Amazon's customer service. 

ATTENTION: Lumo Lift is a product which requires a user's commitment to changing age-old habits and a basic level of tech savvy and familiarity with the product for effective results. Please begin using Lumo Lift only after downloading the Lumo Lift manual at www.lumolift.com/manual. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




The Importance of Posture Your posture affects everything from your health, appearance, communication, mood and even productivity. Poor posture is the leading cause of back pain, which is the most common reason for missed work days, lost productivity and costly doctors bills. Outside of health, your posture plays a large role in the way others view you, as well as impacting your mood and energy levels. The simple act of straightening up your posture and pulling your shoulders back can make a positive change in your life and help you put your best foot forward, all the time.

How the Tech Works The Lumo Lift is a small, lightweight device that is worn just below your collarbone for posture coaching and activity tracking. Using angle displacement as a measure, our patented biomechanics monitoring sensors in the device allow for the Lumo Lift to know when your body slouches away from what you’ve calibrated as your standard of good posture. The Lumo Lift will alert you of slouching with a gentle vibration as a reminder to straighten back up. As the technology relies on body motion tracking, the Lumo Lift is best worn on snug fitting shirts that allow the sensor to stay close to your body.




Get Better Posture Teach your Lumo Lift what good posture looks like to you, and it will make sure that you maintain beautiful, confident posture all day long through subtle vibrations whenever you slouch.

Haptic Feedback Get real-time feedback on your posture and activity levels to motivate you to sit up straighter and to get up and move more.

Track Your Progress Keep track of your posture and activity progress over time through the companion Lumo Lift app. Get insights into your posture hours, step count, distance travelled and calories burned.




The Lumo Lift App Get the compatible Lumo Lift app on iOS 11.3, or Android 11.3 or above, to customize your posture coaching experience, as well as track your progress over time. 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Posture, Habit-Change, Wearable

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

The core mission of Lumo BodyTech is to help unlock the human potential and empower our users to lead healthier, more active lifestyles through the integration of tech. When we realized the significant impact posture had on back pain and how far reaching the benefits are, from reducing stress to building confidence, we knew that we were onto something that could change lives.

What makes your product special?

The Lumo Lift is unique because it addresses a specific problem like posture in a way that hasn’t been done before. Rather than constraining body movement to force good posture, or passively tracking current activities, the Lumo Lift takes it one step further and encourages a change in behavior to coach you into becoming more mindful of your posture.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The form factor for the Lumo Lift was definitely a big challenge in the creation process. The Lumo Lift had to be small enough to be optimal for discreet wear, but also capable of tracking posture from one location on the upper body. There was lots of experimenting and trying out new ideas, but we struck a balance between design, utility and technology and are really excited by the end result.
